alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 2:44PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate to locally heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph creating blowing and drifting snow. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow near the lakeshore. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
